newsitem.title: USA: Northwest Airlines Feb load factor up.
newsitem.headline: Northwest Airlines Feb load factor up.

text.p: Northwest Airlines Corp said Monday its February passenger load factor rose 1.8 points to 70.9 percent from 69.1 percent in the same year-ago period.
Available seat miles increased 1.9 percent to 7.20 billion from 7.07 billion, and revenue passenger miles gained 4.5 percent to 5.11 billion from 4.89 billion.
Year to date, the carrier said its passenger load factor advanced 1.7 points to 69.1 percent from 67.4 percent in 1996.
It said available seat miles increased 3.3 percent to 14.96 billion from 14.49 billion, and revenue passenger miles gained 5.7 percent to 10.33 billion from 9.77 billion.
